,cart2quote_quotable=Use default,hot_start=No,internal_leadtime=---,invisible_search_keywords=anaconda,note=

All OneScript® and OneScript® Plus Reverse Transcriptase products are ISO-13485 certified. 

• Multiple freezing and thawing of RNA should be avoided. Thaw and keep RNA on ice. 
• It is recommended that all RT-PCR is setup under conditions where RNase contamination has been eliminated. Pipette tips and tubes should be treated with 0.1% DEPC.
• Wearing gloves when performing procedure is highly recommended.  

,product_quote=No,reactions=100,reverse_transcriptase=OneScript,shipping_conditions=
